title: WTB:  In search of a T204 Ramly HOFers
author: bounce

posts.post_title: WTB:  In search of a T204 Ramly HOFers
posts.post_content:
Looking for any of the Hall of Famers from this set.

Strongly prefer cards that are already graded, preferably PSA and SGC but would consider BVG as well.

Ideally looking in the 3-4 range, but would certainly consider higher.  I will pay fair prices on these, not looking for deals - just after nice looking cards.

Let me know what you've got.

Please PM me or email to [url]david@davidratliff.com[/url]
Trying this again - would like to tick a few of these off my list in the coming year

I sent an email, did you get it?

Scott
